lead_paragraph: Ms. Lilly was the last surviving great-grandchild of the pharmaceutical magnate Eli Lilly, and gave away an estimated $800 million, most notably in a nine-figure gift to Poetry magazine.
snippet: Ms. Lilly was the last surviving great-grandchild of the pharmaceutical magnate Eli Lilly, and gave away an estimated $800 million, most notably in a nine-figure gift to Poetry magazine.

headline.main: Ruth Lilly, Drug Heiress and Poetry Patron, Dies at 94
headline.print_headline: Ruth Lilly, Drug Heiress and Poetry Patron, Dies at 94
